name: WoodLancer
description:
WoodLancer is game made for 

Improve My Game Jam 20

You play as wood lancer and protect forest from enemies. Alse you can control butterfly to see where enemies.

Controls:

Move - [w,a,s,d]

Jump - space

Attack - left mouse cursor

Advanced attack - E

Butterfly:

switch between butterfly and character - F

[w,a,s,d]

Fly up - space

Fly down - ctrl
